content.question: Chile is able to grow and harvest grapes and strawberries in the months of October through April, while in the United States such fruit is harvested from April through October. The United States has a much larger manufacturing capacity and ships durable goods such as cars and trucks to Chile. These examples can best be explained by

choices.label: the industrial processes of a commodity chain
the economic principle of comparative advantage
the uneven development resulting from colonialism

content.answer: the economic principle of comparative advantage

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain spatial relationships across various geographic scales using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
